original_text:
Calamity upon calamity will come,
    and rumor upon rumor.
They will go searching for a vision from the prophet,
    priestly instruction in the law will cease,
    the counsel of the elders will come to an end.
korean_text: 환난에 환난이 더하고 소문에 소문이 더할 때에 그들이 선지자에게서 묵시를 구하나 헛될 것이며 제사장에게는 율법이 없어질 것이요 장로에게는 책략이 없어질 것이며

sentences.original_text: They will go searching for a vision from the prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 선지자에게서 환상을 구하러 다닐 것이나

sentences.original_text: priestly instruction in the law will cease
the counsel of the elders will come to an end
